name: Spin the Wheel!
description:
[WIP Game for the Extra Credits GameJam]

1 -> Spin the wheel

2 -> Answer (biased)  Questions

3 -> Win

WARNING - Clicking the exit button on the web version will mess up the game and you'll need to reload the page to play it properly.

Game not running in browser? check your browser's WebGL support Here

"Crowd Claps" by Adam_N is licensed under CC BY 1.0

The "Host" sprite is an adaption of the player of the "Free platformer assets" by Warren Clark

The "Player" sprite is an adaption of the "2D Pixel Art Gladiator" by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop

Font is "Bitty" by a very cool guy under MashArcade

"Surfing" by Komiku is licensed under CC BY 1.0  (Backgroud Music)

"Together we are stronger" by Komiku is licensed under CC BY 1.0

SFX where taken from "512 Sound Effects (8-bit style)" by SubspaceAudio licensed under CC BY 1.0 

"Crowd Groan" by Partners In Rhyme

"small crowd yelling 'YEAH'.wav" by Tomlija is licensed under CC BY 1.0

"Step to space" by Rolemusic is licensed under CC BY 4.0

"Grab Hand" is an free cursor(?) asset by Kicked-in-Teeth
